job_title: Customer Contact Advisor in Bristol, England
pros:
* The people are really friendly and inclusive 
* Care about their employees 
* great salary and rewarding role
cons: No real complaints as really enjoy my role

job_title: Customer case manager in London, England
pros: Good Pay and overtime Free Parking
cons: Call centre environment not made clear during interview

pros:
The people...I have fantastic colleagues

Good salary
Job satisfaction ... making a difference to the lives of disabled people
Opportunities for career progression
cons: Workloads can be heavy at times

pros:

job_title: Learning and Development Manager in Harlow, England
pros: Great values and purpose, job security is good and there is good support and teamwork with your peers
cons: Too much red tape so takes a long timefor anything to change

review_title: Good place to build experience in Customer Services
pros:
Fantastic, fulfilling work
Thorough induction training
Great causes to work for
Always busy in most departments
Opportunity to work with some interesting industry stakeholders  
Formal flexible working requests are facilitated in most circumstances
Lovely physical office environment
Good benefits including a free ride to the local  town during lunch hours
cons:
Very few opportunities for progression 
Managing staff tend to be recruited externally, further limiting oportunities for career development

review_title: Mundane and very little scope to advance
cons: Low wage in comparison to the same job locally
highly stressful and pressurised place to work
